title: The order of ceremonies obserued in the annointing and coronation of the most Christian King of France & Nauarre, Henry the IIII. of that name, celebrated in our Lady Church, in the cittie of Chartres vppon Sonday the 27. of February 1594. Faithfully translated out of the French coppy printed at Roan, by commaundement of the said Lord. by E.A.
author: Aggas, Edward.
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprinted by Iohn Windet, and are to be sold by Iohn Flasket, at the great north doore of Paules,
